org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.reply
Interface IAeDurableReplyFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeDurableReplyFactory
public interface IAeDurableReplyFactory

Interface for the factory which is responsible for recreating reply receivers using the prototype pattern.

Method Summary
 IAeReplyReceiver createMissingReplyReceiver(long aReplyId)
          Creates and returns the default missing reply receiver implementation.
 IAeReplyReceiver createReplyReceiver(long aReplyId, IAeDurableReplyInfo aInfo)
          Creates a durable reply given the reply type and its properties.
 

Method Detail

createReplyReceiver

public IAeReplyReceiver createReplyReceiver(long aReplyId,
                                            IAeDurableReplyInfo aInfo)
                                     throws AeBusinessProcessException
Creates a durable reply given the reply type and its properties.

Parameters:
aReplyId - replyId of the corresponding inbound receive.
aInfo - durable reply properties.
Returns:
durable reply receiver or AeMissingReplyReceiver if the type is not supported.
Throws:
AeException
AeBusinessProcessException

createMissingReplyReceiver

public IAeReplyReceiver createMissingReplyReceiver(long aReplyId)
Creates and returns the default missing reply receiver implementation.

Parameters:
aReplyId -
Returns:
AeMissingReplyReceiver class.
